gurmukhi: bIr giRsqnI suBthw kwlwXuD ijh nwm ] pro duSt ky kMT mYN kro hmwro kwm ]284]
transliteration: Beer Gristanisoubhatahaa Kaalaayudh Jih Naam|| Daro Dousht Ke Kanth Main Daro Hamdaro Kaam||284||
translation: O Paash ! Your names are “Vir-Girastani, Subhatahaa, Kalayudh etc.,” You may fall at the throat of the tyrants and fulfil our tasks.284.

gurmukhi: kwl Akwl krwl Bin AwXuD bhur bKwnu ] skl nwm ey pwNs ky cqur ic`q mih jwnu ]285]
transliteration: Kaal Akaal Karaal Bhan(i) Aayudh Bahur Bakhaan|| Sakal Naam Aa Paans Ke Chatur Chitt Maih Jaan(u)||285||
translation: Uttering the words “Kall, Akaal and Karaal”, then adding the word Aayudh, the wise people know all the names of Paash in their mind.285.

gurmukhi: Awid aucrIAY sUrj pd pUq aucrIAY AMq ] SsqR BwKIAY pwNs ky inksih nwm ibAMq ]286]
transliteration: Aadh Ouchriai Sooraj Pad Poot Ouchreeat Ant|| Shastra Bhaakheeal Paans Ke Niksah(i) Naam Beant||286||
translation: Saying “Surya” in the first place, then adding “Puttra” and then saying the word “Shastar” at the end, many names of Paash continue to be evolved.286.

gurmukhi: skl sUrj ky nwm lY suq pd AsqR bKwn ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky cqur ic`q mY jwnu ]287]
transliteration: Sakal Sooraj Ke Naam Lai Sout Pad Astra Bakhaan|| Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Chatur Chitt Mai Jaan||287||
translation: Uttering all the names of Surya and then adding the words “Sut and AAstar”, the wise people know all the names of Paash in their mind.287.

gurmukhi: Bwn idvwkr idnD Bin suq kih AsqR bKwnu ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky cqur ic`q mY jwnu ]288]
transliteration: Bhaan Divaakar Dinadh Bhan(i) Sout Kah(i) Astra Bakhaan(u)|| Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Chatur Chitt Mai Jaan||(u)||288||
translation: Saying the words “Bhaanu, Divaakar and Dinadhi” and then uttering the words “Sut” and Astar”, the wise people come to know all the names of Paash.288.

gurmukhi: idnmix idvkir rYxhw suq kih SsqR bKwn ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky cqur ic`q mY jwnu ]289]
transliteration: Dinman(i) Divkar(i) Rain-haa Sout Kah(i) Shastra Bakhaan|| Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Chatur Chitt Mai Jaan||289||
translation: Saying the words Sut and Shastar after the words “Dinmani, Divaakar and Rainhaa”, the wise peoples know the names of Paash in their mind.289.

gurmukhi: idn ko nwm bKwin kY mix pd bhur bKwn ] suq kih AsqR bKwnIAY nwm pwNs pihcwn ]290]
transliteration: Din Ko Naam Bakhaan(i) Kai Man(i) Pad Bahur Bakhaan|| Sout Kah(i) Astra Bakhaaneeai Naam Paans Paihchaan||290||
translation: Saying the name “Din” and then adding the words “Mani” and “Sut Astar”, all the names of Paash are known.290.

gurmukhi: idvkir idnpiq insir Bin idnnwiek pun BwKu ] suq kih AsqR bKwnIAY nwm pwNs liK rwKu ]291]
transliteration: Divkar(i) Dinpat(i) Nidar(i) Bhan(i) Din-naaik Poun Bhaakh(u)|| Sout Kah(i) Astra Bakhaaneeai Naam Paans Lakh(i) Raakh(u)||291||
translation: By adding “Sut Astar” after “Divaakar, Dinpati, Niashari and Din-nayak”, the names of Paash are known.291.

gurmukhi: skl sUrj ky nwm lY suq kih AsqR bKwn ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky cqur ic`q mih jwnu ]292]
transliteration: Sakal Sooraj Ke Naam Lai Sout Kah(i) Astra Bakhaan|| Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Chatur Chitt Mai Jaan(u)||292||
translation: Uttering all the names of Surya and then adding “Sut Astar”, all the names of Paash are known.292.

gurmukhi: jm pd piRQm bKwin kY SsqR Sbd puin dyh ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky cIn cqur icq lyhu ]293]
transliteration: Jam Pad Pritham Bakhaan(i) Kai Shastra Shabad Poun(i) Deh(u) || Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Cheen Chatur Chit Leh(u)||293||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Yam” and then adding the word “Shastar” the names of Paash are recognized in the mind.293.

gurmukhi: beIvsq pd Awid kih AwXuD AMq bKwnu ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky cqur ic`q mih jwnu ]294]
transliteration: Baeebast Pad Aadh Kah(i) Aayudh Ant Bakhaan|| Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Chatur Chitt Maih Jaan(u)||294||
translation: Saying “Vaivasvat” in the beginning and then adding the word “Aayudh” at the end, all the names of Paash are comprehended in the mind.294.

gurmukhi: kwl Sbd kO Awid kih AsqR Sbd kih AMq ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky inksq clY AnMq ]295]
transliteration: Kaal Shabad Kau Aadh Kah(i) Astra Shabad Kah(i) Ant|| Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Niksat Chalai Anant||295||
translation: Saying the word “Kaal” in the beginning and then putting the word Astar” at the end, innumerable names of Paash continue to be evolved.295.

gurmukhi: ipqr rwj pd piRQm kih AsqR Sbd puin dyhu ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky cIn cqur ic`q lyhu ]296]
transliteration: Pitar Raaj Pad Pritham Kah(i) Astra Shabad Poun(i) Deh(u)|| Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Cheen Chatur Chitt Leh(u)||296||
translation: Saying the word “Pitr-raaj” in the beginning and then adding the word “Astar”, all the names of Paash are recognized.296.

gurmukhi: dMfI piRQm bKwin kY AsqR Sbd kih AMq ] skl nwm sRI pwNs ky cInhu cqur ibAMq ]297]
transliteration: Dandipritham Bakhaan(i) Kai Astra Shabad Kah(i) Ant|| Sakal Naam Sripaans Ke Chinoh Chatur Beant||297||
translation: Uttering firstly the word “Dhandi”, and then putting the word “Astar” at the end, the wise people recognize the innumerable names of Paash.297.
